name: Emcor Group, Inc.
description: Emcor Group, Inc. is a leading provider of mechanical and electrical construction, industrial and energy infrastructure, and facilities services in the United States and internationally. Founded in 1994, Emcor has grown through strategic acquisitions and organic growth, positioning itself as a key player in the construction and facilities management sectors. The company specializes in a wide range of services, including HVAC, plumbing, electrical, and fire protection systems, as well as facility management and maintenance. Emcor serves various industries, including healthcare, education, manufacturing, and commercial real estate, delivering customized solutions that enhance operational efficiency and sustainability. With a strong emphasis on safety, quality, and customer satisfaction, Emcor is committed to providing innovative engineering solutions and superior service. The company also focuses on sustainable practices, integrating energy-efficient technologies and renewable energy solutions into its projects. Emcor's extensive experience and expertise enable it to handle projects of all sizes, from small-scale installations to large-scale infrastructure developments. As a socially responsible corporation, Emcor actively participates in community engagement and philanthropic initiatives, contributing to the betterment of the communities in which it operates.
